origin_description: He was born Kal-El on the planet Krypton, before being rocketed to Earth as an infant by his scientist father Jor-El, moments before Krypton's destruction.
superpowers: Solar energy absorption and healing factor, solar flare and heat vision, solar invulnerability, flight.
catch_phrase: Look, up in the sky, it's a bird, it's a plane, it's Superman!

origin_description: After witnessing the murder of his parents, Bruce Wayne dedicated his life to fighting crime and became the vigilante known as Batman.
superpowers: Genius-level intellect, expert martial artist, peak human physical condition, access to high-tech equipment.
catch_phrase: I am vengeance, I am the night, I am Batman!

origin_description: Princess of the Amazons, Diana was sculpted from clay by her mother and given life by the Greek gods.
superpowers: Superhuman strength, speed, agility, and endurance; expert combatant; wielding magical weapons.
catch_phrase: In the name of all that is good, your wrath upon this world is over!

origin_description: Bitten by a radioactive spider, Peter Parker gained superhuman abilities and a responsibility to use them for good.
superpowers: Wall-crawling, superhuman agility and strength, spider-sense, web-shooting.
catch_phrase: With great power comes great responsibility.

origin_description: After being kidnapped and forced to build a weapon, billionaire genius Tony Stark created a powered suit of armor to escape and became Iron Man.
superpowers: Genius-level intellect, skilled engineer, powered armor suits with advanced technology.
catch_phrase: I am Iron Man.

origin_description: A frail young man enhanced to the peak of human physicality by an experimental serum during World War II.
superpowers: Superhuman strength, agility, endurance, and enhanced reflexes; master tactician and hand-to-hand combatant.
catch_phrase: I can do this all day.

origin_description: The Norse god of thunder, Thor wields the enchanted hammer Mjölnir and fights to protect both Asgard and Earth.
superpowers: Superhuman strength, speed, durability, weather manipulation, flight with Mjölnir.
catch_phrase: For Asgard!

origin_description: Exposed to gamma radiation, Bruce Banner transforms into the Hulk when he experiences extreme anger.
superpowers: Immense superhuman strength, durability, and regenerative healing; strength increases with rage.
catch_phrase: HULK SMASH!

origin_description: A former Russian spy and assassin, Natasha Romanoff became a member of S.H.I.E.L.D. and an Avenger.
superpowers: Expert martial artist, marksman, master spy, enhanced physical abilities.
catch_phrase: I’m not the only monster on the team.

origin_description: Struck by lightning and doused in chemicals, Barry Allen gains the ability to move at superhuman speeds.
superpowers: Super speed, time travel, and the ability to manipulate the Speed Force.
catch_phrase: I am the fastest man alive.

origin_description: Test pilot Hal Jordan is chosen by the Green Lantern Corps to wield a power ring that can create anything he imagines.
superpowers: Energy manipulation, flight, constructs created from willpower.
catch_phrase: In brightest day, in blackest night…

origin_description: The half-human, half-Atlantean prince of Atlantis, Aquaman defends the oceans and the surface world.
superpowers: Superhuman strength, aquatic abilities, telepathic control over marine life.
catch_phrase: I am Aquaman!

origin_description: A former special forces operative turned mercenary, Wade Wilson gains regenerative abilities and becomes the antihero Deadpool.
superpowers: Regenerative healing factor, expert marksman and swordsman, breaking the fourth wall.
catch_phrase: Maximum effort!

origin_description: A mutant with animal-like senses, enhanced physical capabilities, and retractable claws, Logan is a fierce warrior.
superpowers: Regenerative healing factor, enhanced senses, and retractable claws coated with adamantium.
catch_phrase: I’m the best there is at what I do.

origin_description: A former neurosurgeon, Stephen Strange becomes the Sorcerer Supreme after a life-changing accident.
superpowers: Mastery of magic, spell-casting, and interdimensional travel.
catch_phrase: I’m sorry, Stephen. I can’t help you.

origin_description: The king of Wakanda, T'Challa takes on the mantle of Black Panther to protect his nation and the world.
superpowers: Enhanced agility, strength, and reflexes; expert tactician and hand-to-hand combatant.
catch_phrase: Wakanda forever!

origin_description: A billionaire playboy who becomes a vigilante archer, Oliver Queen fights crime with his skilled marksmanship.
superpowers: Expert archer, hand-to-hand combatant, skilled in martial arts.
catch_phrase: You have failed this city!

origin_description: Created from the remnants of Ultron, Vision possesses the Mind Stone and seeks to understand humanity.
superpowers: Density control, flight, and energy manipulation.
catch_phrase: I am Vision.

origin_description: Half-human and half-Celestial, Peter Quill is the leader of the Guardians of the Galaxy.
superpowers: Expert pilot, skilled fighter, and user of advanced technology.
catch_phrase: I am Star-Lord!

origin_description: Raised as the daughter of Thanos, Gamora is a skilled assassin and member of the Guardians of the Galaxy.
superpowers: Enhanced strength, agility, and expert hand-to-hand combat skills.
catch_phrase: I am the deadliest woman in the galaxy.

origin_description: A genetically modified raccoon and master of weaponry, Rocket is a key member of the Guardians of the Galaxy.
superpowers: Genius-level intellect, expert marksman, and master tactician.
catch_phrase: Ain't no thing like me, except me!

origin_description: Blinded by radioactive material, Matt Murdock develops enhanced senses and becomes the vigilante Daredevil.
superpowers: Heightened senses, expert martial artist, and acrobat.
catch_phrase: The man without fear.

origin_description: After receiving a blood transfusion from her cousin Bruce Banner, Jennifer Walters transforms into She-Hulk.
superpowers: Superhuman strength, durability, and expert lawyer.
catch_phrase: You wouldn’t like me when I’m angry.

origin_description: After being exposed to alien technology, Carol Danvers becomes Captain Marvel, one of the universe's most powerful heroes.
superpowers: Superhuman strength, flight, and energy projection.
catch_phrase: Higher, further, faster.

origin_description: A former Marine and mercenary, Marc Spector becomes the Moon Knight after being resurrected by the Egyptian moon god Khonshu.
superpowers: Enhanced strength, agility, and expert combat skills.
catch_phrase: I am the night!

origin_description: After making a deal with the devil, stunt motorcyclist Johnny Blaze becomes the Ghost Rider, a supernatural avenger.
superpowers: Superhuman strength, regeneration, and the ability to control hellfire.
catch_phrase: I am Ghost Rider!
